name: Tsjost's Heroic Soup Bazooka
storyline:
Solve puzzles by eating foodstuff and pushing boulders around.
Can you figure out how to escape?

• Get to the finish line to win each level, by navigating through all its various obstacles.
• Boulders are heavy to push; eat different food items to gain enough temporary strength.
• Use the weight-activated buttons to open doors and clear your path forward.
summary:
Solve puzzles by eating foodstuff and pushing boulders.
Can you figure out how to escape?
